title: How To Ruin The World’s Favorite Sport, 420 Buuuuuddy 4.20.21
itunes:title: How To Ruin The World’s Favorite Sport, 420 Buuuuuddy 4.20.21
description:
In episode 891, Jack and Miles are joined by writer Molly Lambert to discuss the six mass shootings over the weekend, the Chauvin trial, Florida's 'anti-riot' bill, the ESL destroying football, the new Roe v. Wade film, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Deckheads: Chief Stews! on Twitch!
  2. Man arrested in connection with Wisconsin shooting that killed 3 people, injured 3 others, authorities say
  3. Shootings never stopped during the pandemic: 2020 was the deadliest gun violence year in decades
  4. Minneapolis braces for violence over Derek Chauvin verdict as pig’s head left at former home of witness who defended cop
  5. Few Charges, Fewer Convictions: The Chauvin Trial and the History of Police Violence
  6. Florida Senate passes controversial "anti-riot" bill, sends it to DeSantis to sign
  7. The ESL would destroy football as we know it – it’s almost as if they don’t care
  8. Sofia Vergara and Nick Loeb's Frozen Embryo Legal Battle Ends in Louisiana
  9. There’s a New Twist in the Ongoing Legal Battle Over Sofia Vergara’s Frozen Embryos
  10. Inside ‘Roe v. Wade’: A Disturbing Anti-Abortion Film Featuring Milo Yiannopoulos and Tomi Lahren
  11. Comedian Jamie Kennedy on How He Ended Up in an Anti-Abortion Propaganda Film
  12. ‘Roe v. Wade’ Review: Dreadful Anti-Abortion Drama Has No Use for Facts or Filmmaking Basics
  13. New movies to stream this week: ‘Roe v. Wade,’ ‘Every Breath You Take’ and more
  14. ‘Roe v. Wade’ movie features conservative actors, a South Florida director, and Roger Stone as a Washington Post reporter. Yes, that Roger Stone
  15. Nick Loeb’s Roe v. Wade movie will premiere at an Orlando hotel
  16. ‘Roe v. Wade’ Review: A Physician’s Change of Heart
  17. Nick Loeb's 'Roe v. Wade' Actors Call Foul Over No-Show Paychecks
  18. LISTEN: Stormy - Madlib

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
